General.Name: AB Klaipedos nafta
General.Description: AB Klaipedos nafta engages in oil terminal, oil products transshipment, and other related activities primarily in Lithuania and internationally. The company operates through LNGT, OT, and comLNG segments. It operates liquefied natural gas (LNG) terminals; transships oil products, including diesel fuel, gasoline, jet fuel, fuel oil, technological fuel, vacuum gas oil, and crude oil products, as well as other products, such as bitumen, ethanol, monothylene glycol, hydrotreated vegetable oil, and fatty acid methyl ester; reloads crude oil and oil products into trucks; and accumulates and stores crude oil and oil products. The company is also involved in the collection of wastewaters from sea vessels; provision of mooring services; inspection of parameters of oil products; blending of heavy and light oil products; and supply of fuel and water to vessels. In addition, it stores and handles oil products; and adds bio-additives and marks substances to oil products. AB Klaipedos nafta was founded in 1857 and is based in Klaipeda, Lithuania.
